name: Rapid Roll
description:
The exciting adventure of a ball through an infinite number steps, in order to survive. Be part of that adventure now.

FEATURES

* Awesome Adventurous Arenas.

* Powerful Balls 

* Nice Controls

* Simple UI

* Awesome GamePlay Mechanics


Do you miss this Game? It's now free on the Google Play Store. Download now and join the fun, for free!!!
